==Chinese==

===Etymology===
* [[舉]] ([[nominate]]) + [[孝廉]] ([[filial]] and [[honest]])
: In the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], a [[w:Commandery (China)|commandery]] governor could nominate a private citizen for an official post. The nominee was selected for an outstanding record of [[w:filial piety|filial piety]] and [[honesty]].
